text.div:
Core

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://fhir.org/guides/who/core/ImplementationGuide/who.fhir.core

WHO Core Implementation Guide

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: WHO Extended Codes CodeSystem codes
resource.description: Set of codes identified as being needed but not found in existing Code Systems

resource.name: Miscarriage or Abortion values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Miscarriage or Abortion element

resource.name: Reason for no contraceptive method - Reported at intake values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Reason for no contraceptive method - Reported at intake element

resource.name: Marital Status values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Marital Status element

resource.name: HIV Test Result values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the HIV Test Result element

resource.name: Medication-based Birth control method reported at intake values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Medication-based Birth control method reported at intake element

resource.name: STI risk assessment factors values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the STI risk assessment factors element

resource.name: HIV Stage values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the HIV Stage element

resource.name: Pregnancy status values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Pregnancy status element

resource.name: Referred by values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Referred by element

resource.name: Prior contraceptive methods used - Procedure-based values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Prior contraceptive methods used - Procedure-based element

resource.name: Drug allergies values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Drug allergies element

resource.name: Miscarriage or abortion stage of pregnancy values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Miscarriage or abortion stage of pregnancy element

resource.name: Visit type values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Visit type element

resource.name: Reason for referral values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Reason for referral element

resource.name: Occupation values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Occupation element

resource.name: Gender values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Gender element

resource.name: Prior contraceptive methods used - CarePlan-based values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Prior contraceptive methods used - CarePlan-based element

resource.name: Contraceptive history - Device-based values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Contraceptive history - Device-based element

resource.name: Current medications values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Current medications element

resource.name: Highest level of education achieved values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Highest level of education achieved element

resource.name: Payment method values
resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Payment method element

resource.name: Insurance coverage
resource.description: Does the client have insurance coverage?

resource.name: Estimated age
resource.description: If DOB is unknown, enter the client's age. Note displaying the client's age in years.

resource.name: Reminder messages
resource.description: Whether client wants to receive text or other messages as follow-up for family planning

resource.name: Communication consent
resource.description: Indication that client gave consent to be contacted

resource.name: Referred by
resource.description: How the client was referred

resource.name: Miscarriage or abortion stage of pregnancy
resource.description: If the woman recently had a miscarriage or abortion, when in the pregnancy the abortion took place.

resource.name: Highest level of education achieved
resource.description: The highest level of school the client has reached.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Time Postpartum)
resource.description: For a postpartum woman, the amount of time since she delivered.

resource.name: WHO-Core MedicationStatement (Current Medication)
resource.description: Write in the medication not included in the list.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Body Height)
resource.description: The client's height in centimetres.

resource.name: WHO-Core CarePlan (Intake Contraceptive Method)
resource.description: Method the client reports currently using at intake.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Temperature)
resource.description: Temperature of the client in Celsius

resource.name: WHO-Core CarePlan (Prior Contraceptive Methods)
resource.description: Contraceptive methods the client has a history of using

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Last Normal Menses)
resource.description: First day of last normal menses.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Body Weight)
resource.description: The client's current weight in kilograms.

resource.name: WHO-Core DeviceUseStatement (Intake Contraceptive Method)
resource.description: Date of last implant if currently using the method.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (BMI)
resource.description: Body mass index (BMI) is calculated by taking weight in kg divided by the squared height in meters, i.e., kg/m^2.

resource.name: WHO-Core DeviceUseStatement (Prior Contraceptive Methods)
resource.description: Reported use of method at intake

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Gender-based Violence Risk Factors)
resource.description: Gender-based violence risk factors relevant to the population.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Sexual History)
resource.description: If the client has been sexually active

resource.name: WHO-Core MedicationStatement (Prior Contraceptive Methods)
resource.description: Reported use of method at intake

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Sexually Active)
resource.description: Whether or not the client is sexually active.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Never used contraception)
resource.description: If the client has never previously used any modern method of contraception.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (HIV Stage)
resource.description: WHO HIV clinical stage

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (HIV Test)
resource.description: HIV status of client or not known.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (HIV Status)
resource.description: Finding of human immunodeficiency virus status

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Recent Sexual History)
resource.description: Unprotected sexual intercourse

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (STI Risk Factors)
resource.description: STI risk factors relevant to the population (e.g., sexually active, new partner in the past three months, partner has an STI, etc.)

resource.name: WHO-Core AllergyIntolerance (Drug Allergies)
resource.description: Any known medical allergies of the client.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Reason for no contraceptive method at intake)
resource.description: If not currently using a method, the reason why.

resource.name: WHO-Core ServiceRequest (Referral)
resource.description: How the client was referred

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Pregnancy Status)
resource.description: Pregnancy status at visit

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Breastfeeding)
resource.description: Select if a woman is currently breastfeeding.

resource.name: WHO-Core Procedure (Prior Contraceptive Methods)
resource.description: Contraceptive methods the client has a history of using

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Days since Unprotected Sex)
resource.description: Days since unprotected sex

resource.name: WHO-Core Practitioner
resource.description: The provider that served the client.

resource.name: WHO-Core Procedure (Intake Contraceptive Method)
resource.description: Date of sterilization, if not reversed.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Number of Pregnancies)
resource.description: The number of pregnancies (gravidity), current and past, regardless of pregnancy outcome.

resource.name: WHO-Core MedicationStatement (Current Contraceptive Methods)
resource.description: Method the client reports currently using at intake.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Number of births)
resource.description: The number of pregnancies reaching parity.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Gender-based Violence Victim)
resource.description: History of exposure to gender-based violence

resource.name: WHO-Core AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: Any known medical allergies of the client.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Postpartum)
resource.description: Whether client delivered in the past 6 weeks.

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Date of Delivery)
resource.description: For a postpartum woman, the date she recently delivered.

resource.name: WHO-Core Appointment (Visit)
resource.description: The date and time of the client's visit

resource.name: WHO-Core CarePlan (Follow-up)
resource.description: A follow up outreach to the client is recommended

resource.name: WHO-Core Appointment (Return Visit)
resource.description: Date and time of return visit appointment

resource.name: WHO-Core Observation (Clinical Observations)
resource.description: Observations made during an exam or visit.
